name: Laxy Bro 1.5 | Lacrosse Flappy Game
description: Laxy Bro 1.5 is a simple flappy game for lacrosse gamers! In honor of the legendary Flappy Bird, we decided to make a lacrosse game called, Laxy Bro! Now we want to release a sequel to it with new unlockable game levels. Each new level has an added challenge over the original level but also rewards you with unlockable players. Tap to fly the Laxy Bro through the lacrosse sticks and set the world record on the online leaderboards.
